metadata.title: Optimal reserve prices for land auctions in Eastern Germany
metadata.publisher: Informa UK Limited, trading as Taylor & Francis Group

data_sources.description: The dataset includes information on arable land auctions conducted by the BVVG in eastern German states from 2005 to 2019. It contains details on auction packages (lots), which may include one or more plots, and for each sale transaction, the date, number of bidders, and all bids are recorded. Additionally, information on plot size, number of plots, and soil quality is provided. The dataset was used to analyze the potential for increasing revenues through optimal reserve prices in land auctions.
data_sources.access_conditions: Data collected by BVVG, not publicly available

assessment.findability_reason: The data is mentioned in the publication and a link to BVVG's website is provided, but the dataset itself is not directly accessible.
assessment.accessibility_reason: The data is collected by BVVG and is not publicly available, requiring specific access conditions.
assessment.interoperability_reason: The data format and metadata standards are not specified, limiting interoperability.
assessment.reusability_reason: The dataset is not publicly available and lacks detailed metadata, which limits its reusability.

processing_info.filename: Optimal reserve prices for land auctions in Eastern Germany.pdf
